snippet: Deutsche Bank, Goldman Sachs, Credit Suisse and Bank of New York Mellon will keep communications that could be used to track evidence of rigging schemes among traders.
abstract: DealBook Online; Deutsche Bank, Goldman Sachs, Credit Suisse and Bank of New York Mellon agree to keep copies of communications sent through messaging platform Symphony.
lead_paragraph: Deutsche Bank, Goldman Sachs, Credit Suisse and Bank of New York Mellon will keep communications that could be used to track evidence of rigging schemes among traders.

headline.main: Wall Street Banks Reach Deal With Regulators on Data Retention
